allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix KeyError ''action'' in QueryExecutor

Add defensive .get\(\) guards for missing ''action'' and ''store_as'' keys
in query specs. LLM occasionally returns malformed JSON without these
required fields, causing unhandled KeyError crashes.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v2.0.7: defensive query spec guards + chain summary improvements

- Fix KeyError ''action'' in QueryExecutor with .get\(\) guards
- Add _categorize_failure_reason\(\) for grouped incompatibility summaries
- Deduplicate requirement group output per named device
- Group failing variants by \(product, reason\) instead of listing each

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Bump version to 2.0.7

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
